mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.status, o.total_amount, o.pay_amount, o.order_sn, o.member_id, ot.id ot_id, ot.product_id ot_product_id, ot.product_name ot_product_name, ot.product_brand ot_product_brand, ot.product_pic ot_product_pic, ot.product_price ot_product_price, ot.product_sku_id ot_product_sku_id, ot.product_sku_code ot_product_sku_code, ot.product_quantity ot_product_quantity, ot.product_attr ot_product_attr FROM oms_order o LEFT JOIN oms_order_item ot ON o.id = ot.order_id WHERE o.delete_status = 0 and o.id = #{orderId}

SELECT o.id, o.order_sn, o.coupon_id, o.integration, o.member_id, o.use_integration, ot.id ot_id, ot.product_name ot_product_name, ot.product_sku_id ot_product_sku_id, ot.product_sku_code ot_product_sku_code, ot.product_quantity ot_product_quantity FROM oms_order o LEFT JOIN oms_order_item ot ON o.id = ot.order_id WHERE o.status = 0 AND o.create_time < date_add(NOW(), INTERVAL -#{minute} MINUTE);
mapper.update: update oms_order set delete_status = 1 WHERE status >= 3 and delete_status = 0 and id=#{orderId}
